description: Spectral cards are powerful consumables with dramatic effects that often involve destroying cards or Jokers.
source: Spectral Packs, Blue Seal, Ouija Board Joker

cards.effect_en: Destroy 1 random card in your hand, add 3 random Enhanced face cards to your hand
cards.effect_zh: 銷毀手中 1 張隨機牌，新增 3 張隨機強化人頭牌到手中

cards.effect_en: Destroy 1 random card in your hand, add 2 random Enhanced Aces to your hand
cards.effect_zh: 銷毀手中 1 張隨機牌，新增 2 張隨機強化 A 到手中

cards.effect_en: Destroy 1 random card in your hand, add 4 random Enhanced numbered cards to your hand
cards.effect_zh: 銷毀手中 1 張隨機牌，新增 4 張隨機強化數字牌到手中

cards.effect_en: Add a Gold Seal to 1 selected card in your hand
cards.effect_zh: 為手中 1 張選擇的牌新增金色封印

cards.effect_en: Add Foil, Holographic, or Polychrome effect to 1 selected card in hand
cards.effect_zh: 為手中 1 張選擇的牌新增閃卡、全息或幻彩效果

cards.effect_en: Creates a random Rare Joker, sets money to $0
cards.effect_zh: 創造一張隨機稀有小丑，金錢歸零

cards.effect_en: Converts all cards in hand to a single random suit
cards.effect_zh: 將手中所有牌轉換為同一隨機花色

cards.effect_en: Converts all cards in hand to a single random rank, -1 hand size
cards.effect_zh: 將手中所有牌轉換為同一隨機點數，-1 手牌上限

cards.effect_en: Add Negative to a random Joker, -1 hand size
cards.effect_zh: 為隨機小丑新增負片效果，-1 手牌上限

cards.effect_en: Destroys 5 random cards in hand, gain $20
cards.effect_zh: 銷毀手中 5 張隨機牌，獲得 $20

cards.effect_en: Create a copy of a random Joker, destroy all other Jokers (Removes Negative from copy)
cards.effect_zh: 複製一張隨機小丑，銷毀所有其他小丑（複製品會移除負片效果）

cards.effect_en: Add a Red Seal to 1 selected card in your hand
cards.effect_zh: 為手中 1 張選擇的牌新增紅色封印

cards.effect_en: Add Polychrome to a random Joker, destroy all other Jokers
cards.effect_zh: 為隨機小丑新增幻彩效果，銷毀所有其他小丑

cards.effect_en: Add a Blue Seal to 1 selected card in your hand
cards.effect_zh: 為手中 1 張選擇的牌新增藍色封印

cards.effect_en: Add a Purple Seal to 1 selected card in your hand
cards.effect_zh: 為手中 1 張選擇的牌新增紫色封印

cards.effect_en: Create 2 copies of 1 selected card in your hand
cards.effect_zh: 複製手中 1 張選擇的牌 2 份

cards.effect_en: Creates a Legendary Joker (Must have room)
cards.effect_zh: 創造一張傳奇小丑（需有空間）

cards.effect_en: Upgrade every poker hand by 1 level
cards.effect_zh: 所有撲克牌型升級 1 級

seals.effect: Earn $3 when this card is played and scores
Creates a Planet card if this card is held in hand at end of round
Creates a Tarot card when discarded

notes: Spectral cards are more rare and powerful than Tarot cards
Can be obtained from Spectral Packs or via Blue Seal cards
Some Spectral cards have significant downsides (destroying cards/Jokers, reducing hand size)
The Soul is the only way to guarantee a Legendary Joker
Black Hole is extremely powerful as it upgrades all poker hands simultaneously
